page.title: 11DUNCAN'S DAY
page.content:
A Typical Day in the Life of Duncan I get up at 6.45, make my bed get dressed. I have my brekfast at 7.30. I have a bowl of Start and a bowl of porridge and two slices of toast and a biscuit. Then I look out the window to see what my Dad is doing on our farm. Then I see the taxi is coming so I take my bag and go into the taxi which takes me to school. At school I do Maths, English and Art. At playtime I play football with my friends Peter, Alan,Martin and Paul. We have lunch at 12.15 and another playtime at 2.30 and we go home at 3.20.Then I go home then I do my homework. Then I go out and help my Dad on the farm by driving the grain trailers while my Dad drives the combine then I go to bed at 8.30.
Duncan Henderson
